channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report E-2023080389
item.description:
Report E-2023080389

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: POCATELLO
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one poly 5 gallon pails Lo pH Conditioner Blue Cherry (un2796) of 1.5 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
